info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets the specified service Endpoint Policies in a specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands referenced resources.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a service Endpoint Policies.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update service endpoint policy operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicy resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates tags of a service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to update service endpoint policy tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all the service endpoint policies in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ServiceEndpointPolicy resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all service endpoint Policies in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ServiceEndpointPolicy resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the specified service endpoint policy definitions from service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy name.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy definition name.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicyDefinition resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a service endpoint policy definition in the specified service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy definition name.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update service endpoint policy operation.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicyDefinition resource.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting ServiceEndpointPolicyDefinition resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified ServiceEndpoint policy definitions.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the Service Endpoint Policy.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy definition.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all service endpoint policy definitions in a service end point policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceEndpointPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the service endpoint policy name.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns a list of ServiceEndpointPolicyDefinition resources.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

description.description: A description for this rule. Restricted to 140 chars.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the service endpoint policy definition resource.

properties.description: Properties of the service endpoint policy definition.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

value.description: The service endpoint policy definition in a service endpoint policy.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ServiceEndpointPolicyDefinitionListResul.description: Response for ListServiceEndpointPolicyDefinition API service call. Retrieves all service endpoint policy definition that belongs to a service endpoint policy.

serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions.description: A collection of service endpoint policy definitions of the service endpoint policy.

subnets.description: A collection of references to subnets.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the service endpoint policy resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the service endpoint policy resource.

properties.description: Properties of the service end point policy.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

ServiceEndpointPolicyListResult.description: Response for ListServiceEndpointPolicies API service call.
